events.name: PATRIOTS Basketball Club vs Tiger BBC
events.description: The Super Cup will take place in Tenerife on September 12th and 13th, while the league will begin on the 18th.
events.event_details: The ACB clubs met this Thursday in Madrid at the Ordinary General Assembly, where they approved the start dates of the 2020-21 season. The competition will begin on September 12 and 13 with the Endesa Super Cup. It will take place in Tenerife and TD Systems Baskonia, Real Madrid, Barça and Iberostar Tenerife will compete for the first available title of the season. As for the Endesa League, the first matches will be played on September 18, 19 and 20.
